feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.9.8
entry.content:
Added

  • A possibility to create areas. To create an area, click on the Areas checkbox in map controls (top right corner of the map), then in the top left corner of the map, click on a small circle icon. This will enable draw tool, allowing you to draw an area. When you finish drawing, release the mouse button, and the area will be created. Click on the area, set the name and click "Save" to save the area. You can also delete the area by clicking on the trash icon in the area popup.
  • A background job to calculate your visits. This job will calculate your visits based on the areas you've created.
  • Visits page. This page will show you all your visits, calculated based on the areas you've created. You can see the date and time of the visit, the area you've visited, and the duration of the visit.
  • A possibility to confirm or decline a visit. When you create an area, the visit is not calculated immediately. You need to confirm or decline the visit. You can do this on the Visits page. Click on the visit, then click on the "Confirm" or "Decline" button. If you confirm the visit, it will be added to your timeline. If you decline the visit, it will be removed from your timeline.
  • Settings for visit calculation. You can set the minimum time spent in the area to consider it as a visit. This setting can be found in the Settings page.
  • POST /api/v1/areas and GET /api/v1/areas endpoints. You can now create and list your areas via the API.

‚ö†Ô∏è Visits functionality is still in beta. If you find any issues, please let me know. ‚ö†Ô∏è

Fixed

  • Call to the background job to calculate visits

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f5a80c2b-ea39-4956-8fa4-97c359d8ccd6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.9.7...0.9.8

üíô This release is supported by üíô

  • James Manolios

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.9.9
entry.content:
Added

  • Pagination to exports page
  • Pagination to imports page
  • GET /api/v1/points endpoint to get all points for the user with swagger docs
  • DELETE /api/v1/points/:id endpoint to delete a single point for the user with swagger docs
  • DELETE /api/v1/areas/:id swagger docs
  • User can now change route opacity in settings
  • Points on the Points page can now be ordered by oldest or newest points
  • Visits on the Visits page can now be ordered by oldest or newest visits

Changed

  • Point deletion is now being done using an api key instead of CSRF token

Fixed

  • OpenStreetMap layer is now being selected by default in map controls

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.9.8...0.9.9

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios on Patreon üíô

If you like Dawarich, consider subscribing on Patreon or making a one-time donate on Ko-fi :)

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.9.10
entry.content:
Added

  • PHOTON_API_HOST env variable to set the host of the Photon API. It will allow you to use your own Photon API instance instead of the default one.

More details on how to set your own Photon API instance you'll find in Dawarich Docs

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Bump bootsnap from 1.18.3 to 1.18.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/158
  • Bump sprockets-rails from 3.5.1 to 3.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/156
  • Bump tailwindcss-rails from 2.6.3 to 2.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/157
  • Bump pg from 1.5.6 to 1.5.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/145
  • Bump oj from 3.16.4 to 3.16.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/170
  • Bump shoulda-matchers from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/171
  • Bump tailwindcss-rails from 2.7.0 to 2.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/172
  • Implement support for custom Photon API host by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.9.9...0.9.10

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.9.11
entry.content:
[0.9.11] ‚Äî 2024-08-14

Fixed

  • A bug where an attempt to import a Google's Records.json file was failing due to the wrong object being passed to a background worker (#152)

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios on Patreon üíô

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.9.12
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Owntracks points are now being saved to the database with the full attributes
  • Existing owntracks points also filled with missing data
  • The definition of "reverse geocoded points" is now correctly based on the number of points that have full reverse geocoding data instead of the number of points that have only country and city
  • Fixed a bug in gpx importing scipt (thanks, bluemax!)

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Improve GPX Parser by @bluemaex in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/126
  • Update owntracks points with missing data by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/174

New Contributors

  • @bluemaex made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.9.11...0.9.12
